carpooling_package

Class Process

  • java.lang.Object
    • carpooling_package.Process

  • public class Process
extends java.lang.Object
    It's a class that controls on moving from function to another and the branching of the methods.

    • Field Summary

      static Car car_obj

      to read the input from the user.

      static boolean registerd

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void enterYourID(int choice)
      Here the branching of the most of the system for 3 methods:
      choice = 2 : It would make him subscribe the system (But first he check if entered a correct ID)
      choice = 3 : It would make him Un-subscribe the system (But first he check if entered a correct ID)
      choice = 4 : It would make him choose the route, reserve a ticket and write a review(But first he check if entered a correct ID).
      void start()
      If the user chose 1, It would make him add new user (Initially Unsubscriber).

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Process

        public Process(int choice)
        Parameters:
        choice - is the input that the user entered (The option he chose from the menu).

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        If the user chose 1, It would make him add new user (Initially Unsubscriber).
        If the user chose 2, It would make him subscribe the system (But first he check if entered a correct ID)
        If the user chose 3, It would make him Un-subscribe the system (But first he check if entered a correct ID)
        If the user chose 4, It would make him choose the route, reserve a ticket and write a review(But first he check if entered a correct ID).

      • enterYourID

        public static void enterYourID(int choice)
        Here the branching of the most of the system for 3 methods:
        choice = 2 : It would make him subscribe the system (But first he check if entered a correct ID)
        choice = 3 : It would make him Un-subscribe the system (But first he check if entered a correct ID)
        choice = 4 : It would make him choose the route, reserve a ticket and write a review(But first he check if entered a correct ID).
        Parameters:
        choice -
